Sentece: The distribution phase lasted for about 8 hrs, the mean apparent volume of distribution was 16.6 l/kg, and the total body clearance was on average 12.3 ml/min.

Sentece: Levomepromazine (n = 17) significantly (p < 0.001) increased plasma concentrations of bromperidol (7.3 +/- 4.1 versus 10.2 +/- 4.8 ng/ml) and reduced bromperidol (1.8 +/- 1.4 versus 4.5 +/- 3.3 ng/ml).
